mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, author, created_at, updated_at FROM post ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, content, author, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, author = #{author}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
